A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: cons: Lazy writing \, horrible character arcs \, universe breaking failures in logic ( lightspeed) \, spitting on the original cast\, filler side-adventure \, a lack of basic strategical thinking \, unnecessary comedy \, snook becoming a useless character \, this movie's only contribution to the starwars universe is getting rid of the old starwars.\nPros : Adam Driver's acting \, BB-8 \, visuals \, John Williams \, Mark Hammil's acting .\nI left The Force Awakens disappointed \, i left  The Last Jedi Angry and confused how any writer could say: This is a script worthy of a billion dollar star wars movie.
